net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.feature

Interface UiFeatureClick

  • All Superinterfaces:
    UiFeature
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UiWidgetAbstractButton, UiWidgetButton, UiWidgetClickable, UiWidgetLink, UiWidgetMenuItemClickable, UiWidgetToggleButton
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetAbstractButton, AbstractUiWidgetButton, AbstractUiWidgetClickable, AbstractUiWidgetCollapsableSection, AbstractUiWidgetLink, AbstractUiWidgetMenuItemClickable, AbstractUiWidgetToggleButton, UiWidgetButtonGwt, UiWidgetButtonTestImpl, UiWidgetCollapsableSectionGwt, UiWidgetCollapsableSectionTestImpl, UiWidgetCustomButton, UiWidgetCustomButtonSave, UiWidgetLinkGwt, UiWidgetLinkTestImpl, UiWidgetMenuItemClickableGwt, UiWidgetMenuItemClickableTestImpl, UiWidgetToggleButtonGwt

    public interface UiFeatureClick
extends UiFeature
    This is the interface for the features of a clickable object. It can be clicked and allows to add and remove instances of UiHandlerEventClick.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClickHandler(UiHandlerEventClick handler)
      This method adds the given UiHandlerEventClick to this object.
      void click()
      This method programmatically notifies all registered listeners.
      boolean removeClickHandler(UiHandlerEventClick handler)
      This method removes the given UiHandlerEventClick from this object.

    • Method Detail

      • addClickHandler

        void addClickHandler(UiHandlerEventClick handler)
        This method adds the given UiHandlerEventClick to this object.
        Parameters:
        handler - is the UiHandlerEventClick to add.

      • removeClickHandler

        boolean removeClickHandler(UiHandlerEventClick handler)
        This method removes the given UiHandlerEventClick from this object.
        Parameters:
        handler - is the UiHandlerEventClick to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the handler has been removed successfully, false if it was NOT registered and nothing has changed.

      • click

        void click()
        This method programmatically notifies all registered listeners.
